### isDependenceDistanceOfOne() {#af7b88a2a7449e4edc75721e2ab686d9e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopLoadElimination.cpp&#125;::StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate::isDependenceDistanceOfOne (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution">PredicatedScalarEvolution</a> &amp; PSE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if the dependence from the store to the load has an absolute distance of one.

E.g. A&#91;i+1&#93; = A&#91;i&#93; (or A&#91;i-1&#93; = A&#91;i&#93; for descending loop)
